briefdescription.para: Macro for creating an EGU driver instance.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the event that generated the interrupt.
Context passed to the event handler. Set on initialization.

memberdef.argsstring: (nrfx_egu_t const *p_instance, uint8_t interrupt_priority, nrfx_egu_event_handler_t event_handler, void *p_context)
memberdef.name: nrfx_egu_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the EGU driver instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
Interrupt priority.
Event handler provided by the user. In case of providing NULL, event notifications are not done and EGU interrupts are disabled.
Context passed to the event handler.
Initialization was successful.
The driver is already initialized.
The driver is already initialized. Deprecated - use NRFX_ERROR_ALREADY instead.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling interrupts on specified events of a given EGU driver instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
Mask of events with interrupts to be enabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of the specified EGU task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
EGU task.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of the specified EGU event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
EGU event.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling interrupts on specified events of a given EGU driver instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
Mask of events with interrupts to be disabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for triggering an event specified by event_idx of a given EGU driver instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
Index of the event to be triggered.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the EGU driver instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the EGU driver instance is initialized.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
Instance is already initialized.
Instance is not initialized.
